title: internship in PVL!
content: Am from ec campus, is there any chance i can do an internship for PVL in rr campus?will they be fine with me being from different  campus?

comments.body: Should i come to rr campus  like frequently  or can i stay in ec campus and just do it  from here???
u can go to rr campus once in a while but mostly u can do the work from home.
